CHAT.comment: TALK AMERICA, INC., Petitioner v. MICHIGAN BELL TELEPHONE COMPANY, DBA AT&T MICHIGAN
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:07 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOHN J. BURSCH ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ERIC D. MILLER, ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF SCOTT H. ANGSTREICH ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JOHN J. BURSCH ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:05 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
